answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample RFQ’s and RFP’s you may find helpful.
City of Sparks, NV
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13020/RFP_for_City_Branding
City of San Carlos, CA
http://www.cityofsancarlos.org/documents/SanCarlosMarketingBrandingRFP4909v3.pdf
City of DuPont, WA
http://www.ci.dupont.wa.us/files/library/b3f2810636e45844_o.pdf
City of Nashua, NH
http://www.gonashua.com/LinkClick.aspx?fileticket=AY5tGO5Xq4o%3D&tabid=539
St. Louis County, MO
http://www.slcec.com/cmss_files/attachmentlibrary/Lemay%20Branding%20&%20Streetscape%20RFP.pdf
I have also included two articles which you might find interesting.
This PowerPoint presentation is about Community Branding: Beyond a Logo and a Line.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303331/Community_Branding_Beyond_a_Logo_and_a_Line
This article discusses the top mistakes cities make while creating a brand and the best ways to avoid them.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4778/Talk_from_the_Trenches_Top_12_Community_Branding_Blunders_and_How_to_Avoid_Them
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Patricia Himelberger
text: Does anyone have a sample RFQ to qualify firms to provide branding, ad design and placement recommendations to a small town?
title: Marketing RFQ
